text: The Sweet (also known as Sweet) are a British glam rock band. The group is famous for the songs such as "Ballroom Blitz", "Little Willy", "Fox on the Run" and "Love is Like Oxygen". The group was originally called Sweetshop. == Studio albums == * Funny How Sweet Co-Co Can Be (1971) * Sweet Fanny Adams (1974) * Desolation Boulevard (1974) * Give Us a Wink (1976) * Off the Record (1977) * Level Headed (1978) * Cut Above the Rest (1979) * Waters Edge (1980) * Identity Crisis (1982) Category:British rock bands Category:British pop music groups Category:British heavy metal bands Category:Glam metal bands
title: The Sweet
